rows.name: Project Initiation
rows.description: Initial project setup, stakeholder meetings, and requirement gathering.

rows.name: Requirements Analysis
rows.description: Detailed analysis of business requirements and technical specifications.

rows.name: System Architecture
rows.description: Design system architecture, database schema, and technology stack selection.

rows.name: UI/UX Design
rows.description: Create wireframes, mockups, and user interface designs.

rows.name: Frontend Development
rows.description: Implement user interface components and client-side functionality.

rows.name: Backend Development
rows.description: Build server-side logic, APIs, and database integration.

rows.name: Integration Testing
rows.description: Test integration between frontend and backend components.

rows.name: User Acceptance Testing
rows.description: Conduct testing with end users and gather feedback.

rows.name: Performance Optimization
rows.description: Optimize application performance and resolve bottlenecks.

rows.name: Security Audit
rows.description: Comprehensive security review and vulnerability assessment.

rows.name: Documentation
rows.description: Create user manuals, technical documentation, and training materials.

rows.name: Deployment Preparation
rows.description: Set up production environment and deployment pipelines.

rows.name: Production Deployment
rows.description: Deploy application to production and monitor initial launch.

rows.name: Post-Launch Support
rows.description: Monitor system performance and provide ongoing support.
